show.title: Project Censored

title: Post Capitalist Democracy & Independent Media
content: Co-hosts Peter Phillips and Mickey Huff spend the hour in conversation with media scholar Robert McChesney, discussing... <!--more--> topics from political conditions in the U-S, post-capitalist democracy, and a plan for financing independent media. McChesney teaches at the University of Illinois; his latest book is “Blowing the Roof Off the Twenty-First Century.”
